Sections.Name: Modules
Sections.Description: Enable or disable the optional modules contained in this mod

Keys.Name: lootRebalance
Keys.Description: Rebalances loot on mobs and in piles

Keys.Name: bandaging
Keys.Description: Allows bandages to stack, and to be used for healing based on medical skill

Keys.Name: conditionBasedPrices
Keys.Description: Item prices are based on condition and loot you find can be quite worn out

Keys.Name: realisticEnemyEquipment
Keys.Description: Enemy equipment is realistic for their class and can be variable condition

Keys.Name: skillBasedStartingEquipment
Keys.Description: Player starting equipment is based on skills

Keys.Name: skillBasedStartingSpells
Keys.Description: Player starting spells are based on skills

Keys.Name: refinedWeaponDamage
Keys.Description: Refined damage ranges to give more valid weapon choices

Keys.Name: newWeapons
Keys.Description: Adds two new weapons to the game, Archers Axe and Light Flail
